description: Non-Material Amendment to the planning permission ref: 2020/4110 (decision dated 30/11/2021).  Amendments to the approved floor plans in the retail basement and ground floor areas and at first floor flat roof level for fire safety compliance, to incorporate emergency smoke shaft equipment
